SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Courses Instance data returned in JSON format. Note that some of these fields (those dealing with participant numbers) only apply to workshop instances.

PARAMETERS.NAME: ID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Activity Type ID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: InstanceID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Instance ID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The type of the activity. w = workshop, p = accredited program, el = e-learning, all = workshops, accredited programs and e-learning.

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainingCategory
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Training Category to Search - Uses Like operator %name%

PARAMETERS.NAME: location
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course delivery location to search - Uses Like operator %name%. Only works with type 'w' instances where a delivery location is specified. Matches on Display Name if it is used or Delivery Location Name if Display Name is blank.

PARAMETERS.NAME: state
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course State to search - works with type 'w' & 'p' instances.

PARAMETERS.NAME: code
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course code to search - Uses Like operator: code%

PARAMETERS.NAME: name
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course name to search - Uses Like operator %name%

PARAMETERS.NAME: searchTerm
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: For a general search use this param

PARAMETERS.NAME: enrolmentOpen
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Return Course Instances that are open for enrolment.

PARAMETERS.NAME: startDate_min
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course start date must be greater than this date. Null values will also be returned for el and p types. Ignored if instanceID is passed.

PARAMETERS.NAME: startDate_max
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course start date must be less than this date. Null values will also be returned for el and p types. Ignored if instanceID is passed.

PARAMETERS.NAME: finishDate_min
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course finish date must be greater than this date. Null values will also be returned for el and p types.

PARAMETERS.NAME: finishDate_max
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The course finish date must be less than this date. Null values will also be returned for el and p types.

PARAMETERS.NAME: lastUpdated_min
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: In 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm' format with time optional. The course instance last updated date must be greater than or equal to this datetime. NOTE: lastUpdated_min & max must be used together (unless ID is passed) and can be up to 90 days apart. These fields are mutually exclusive with start and finish date min/max searches and are both ignored if instanceID is passed.

PARAMETERS.NAME: lastUpdated_max
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: In 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm' format with time optional. The course instance last updated date must be less than or equal to this datetime.

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainerContactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The ContactID of the Trainer/Consultant the instance is assigned to.

PARAMETERS.NAME: domainID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The DomainID the instance belongs to (the domainID of the user).

PARAMETERS.NAME: deliveryLocationID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: For type = p only. The unique ID of an accredited delivery location, reported to NCVER. Refers to locations listed under the course/deliveryLocations endpoint.

PARAMETERS.NAME: orgID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The organisation ID of the Client Contact of the course.

PARAMETERS.NAME: orgIDTree
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Client Contact of the course is either this Organisation ID or a child organisation of this Organisation ID.

PARAMETERS.NAME: offset
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - start at record.

PARAMETERS.NAME: displayLength
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Used for paging - total records to retrieve.

PARAMETERS.NAME: sortColumn
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The column index to sort by.

PARAMETERS.NAME: sortDirection
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The sort by direction 'ASC' OR 'DESC'.

PARAMETERS.NAME: public
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether to include public courses. If false, returns only In-House course instances.

PARAMETERS.NAME: isActive
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: You can chose to include or exclude Deleted / Archived and Inactive courses.

PARAMETERS.NAME: purgeCache
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Currently the API will cache the query for 30 seconds - Setting this flag to true gets the latest data.

PARAMETERS.NAME: groupedCourseName
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: If the Grouped Workshop Data flag is on in your account, you can search by the Grouped Course Name (Type W Only)

PARAMETERS.NAME: groupedCourseID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: If the Grouped Workshop Data flag is on in your account, you can search by the Grouped Course ID (Type W Only)

PARAMETERS.NAME: Status
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Status of the Workshop. The available choices are as follows: Active, Cancelled, Completed, Incomplete, Tentative

DESCRIPTION: Advanced Course Instance Search - Returns instances.
